CustomField.description: This can be used within Email templates to prefill or link a form for/to a recipient. The Flow Tool Kit allows for up to 10 URL parameters. This would pass in a Contacts record Id to pv1 and their AccountId into pv2. It is more secure to pass in pass in a combination of unique record values for your Flow lookup/get actions. You would use pv1(Id) and pv2(AccountId) to query the recipient's Contact record.
CustomField.label: Recipient Form Keys
